## Pull Request Policy

Thank you for the interest.

This repository contains the canonical CoSyn governance specification.
It is not accepting pull requests.

The purpose of this repository is to provide:
- an authoritative reference for governance rules, and
- a basis for inspection, discussion, and interpretation.

### What to do instead
Please open an Issue if you have:
- a question,
- a clarification request, or
- feedback on interpretation.

Pull requests proposing changes, extensions, refactors, or new rules
will be closed without review.
